form.title: Work Opportunity Tax Credit (WOTC) Application
form.subtitle: Pre-Screening Notice and Certification Request

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.tooltip: Enter your legal first name as it appears on your official documents

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.tooltip: Enter your legal last name as it appears on your official documents

dateOfBirth.label: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.tooltip: Enter your date of birth in the format MM/DD/YYYY

benefits.title: Benefits Information
benefits.subtitle: Please provide information about your benefits status

snap.title: SNAP Benefits
snap.tooltip: SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program) provides nutrition benefits to supplement the food budget of needy families

current.label: Are you a member of a family that received SNAP benefits during the past 6 months?
current.tooltip: Select 'Yes' if your family has received SNAP benefits in the last 6 months

past.label: Did you get SNAP for 3 out of the past 5 months but are no longer getting them?
past.tooltip: Select 'Yes' if you received SNAP benefits for at least 3 months in the past 5 months but are not currently receiving them

recipient.name: Name of Primary Recipient
recipient.tooltip: Enter the name of the person who is the primary recipient of the SNAP benefits

additional.info: Please provide additional information about your SNAP benefits

snap.startDate.tooltip: Enter the date when you started receiving SNAP benefits
snap.endDate.tooltip: Enter the date when your SNAP benefits ended

tanf.title: TANF Benefits
tanf.tooltip: TANF (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) provides financial assistance to help pay for food, shelter, utilities, and expenses other than medical

current.label: Are you a member of a family that received TANF benefits for the last 18 months?
current.tooltip: Select 'Yes' if your family has received TANF benefits in the last 18 months

past.label: Were you a member of a family that received TANF for at least 9 months in the past 18 months?
past.tooltip: Select 'Yes' if you received TANF benefits for at least 9 months in the past 18 months

months.tooltip: If you received TANF benefits for any 9 months during the 18-month period ending on your hiring date, please select 'Yes'

recipient.name: Name of Primary Recipient
recipient.tooltip: Enter the name of the person who is the primary recipient of the TANF benefits

additional.info: Please provide additional information about your TANF benefits

tanf.startDate.tooltip: Enter the date when you started receiving TANF benefits
tanf.endDate.tooltip: Enter the date when your TANF benefits ended

current.label: Have you received SSI benefits in any month ending within 60 days before your hire date?
current.tooltip: SSI provides cash assistance to aged, blind, and disabled individuals who have little or no income

current.label: Have you been unemployed for a total of at least 27 consecutive weeks AND received unemployment compensation for at least part of that time?
current.tooltip: Select 'Yes' if you were unemployed for at least 27 consecutive weeks (about 6 months) and received unemployment compensation during that period

additional.info: Please provide information about the state where you received unemployment compensation

state.tooltip: Select the state where you received unemployment compensation

certification.title: Certification
certification.text: Under penalties of perjury, I declare that I gave the above information to complete this form and that, to the best of my knowledge, the information is true, correct, to complete the IRS Form 8850 and any other documents pertaining to the WOTC Program, and that modifications can be made by my employer, or employer representative, in order to enable the verification screening process as required by some states.

signature.label: Signature
signature.tooltip: Sign in this area to confirm that the information you provided is true and accurate

form.tooltip: Click this button to submit your application
